text: One of the royal wedding page boys inadvertently took center stage as Meghan Markle walked down the aisle Saturday. As Markle approached her husband - to - be, Prince Harry, television cameras captured one of the clearly excited 7 - year - old Mulroney twins sporting this hilarious expression : Sky News The twins, John and Brian Mulroney, are sons of Ben and Jessica Mulroney, who are close friends of Markle, and the grandsons of former Canadian prime minister Brian Mulroney. For more Prince Harry and Meghan Markle coverage, sign up for our “ Watching the Royals ” newsletter.
